valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Mon 26 Jan 2026 to 12:00 (UTC) on Tue 27 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: New low expected Fastnet 952 by 0600 tomorrow

Viking.text:
Wind
In southwest, southeasterly 4 to 6, increasing 6 to gale 8 later. In northeast, southeasterly 3 to 5.
Sea state
In southwest, moderate or rough becoming rough or very rough later. in northeast, slight or moderate.
Weather
In southwest, wintry showers. In northeast, mainly fair.
Visibility
In southwest, good, occasionally poor. In northeast, good.

Gale warning
Issued:
09:50 (UTC) on Mon 26 Jan 2026
Southeasterly gale force 8 expected later
